name: Purple Mountain's Majesty
description:
This is just a game I made for the hexcode game jam, I realized that this idea was pretty cool but I didn't have enough time to add everything I wanted. there were 3 bosses planned that I had to scrap because of the time. But all that aside, it was a pretty fun experience. I'd love to see feedback and opinions on the game, so I know what I can do better next time. Anyway I hope you have with the game!

The second theme crayola color I used was purple mountains majesty, the color of the mountain (#d6aedd/0xd6aedd)
